    • Constructor Summary

      Bot(com.google.code.chatterbotapi.ChatterBotType botType)

      Use Bot(String botId) for that.

      • getMsgFormat

        public java.lang.String getMsgFormat()
        <msg> - is replaced with the bots repsonse
        <botName> - is replaced with the bots given name
        <player> - is replaced with the name of the player that asked the question
        Returns:
        the blank message template

      • setMsgFormat

        public void setMsgFormat(java.lang.String msgFormat)
        <msg> - is replaced with the bots repsonse
        <botName> - is replaced with the bots given name
        <player> - is replaced with the name of the player that asked the question
        Parameters:
        msgFormat - the new message format

      • getName

        Sets the name of the bot.
        Parameters:
        name - the bots new name

      • refreshSession

        public void refreshSession()
        Refreshes the current chat session. Can be thought of as saying goodbye to the bot and meeting it again as a new person.
